name: Reclaiming Goltarren
description:
Reclaiming Goltarren is a turn based fantasy rouge-like where four adventures must delve into the depths of the long abandoned underground city. 

This is an early build, so expect some UI wonkiness and bugs.  All keys are bindable through the controls menu.  Just click the button on the menu and hit the key you want to change the binding to.

It's not terribly clear in game, but if you're casting a spell or firing a bow, you'll use the your directional buttons to change the targeted tiles and hit Enter to confirm the location.

To use the stairs, stand on top of them and hit the InteractWithCurrentTile button (it's Space by default).  There is an issue where items can spawn on the stairs, so if you've looked all over and can't find them, try picking up random items on the ground.

By default, you can use Tab to rotate the active character of your party.

If a party member dies, don't forget to pick up their stuff!
